user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my friend and want to create a photo album. Can you help me check if a specific file with the path '/photos/album1.jpg' exists? Additionally, I would like to know the available file formats supported by the GroupDocs Editor Cloud API.

TaskList.description: Check if the file '/photos/album1.jpg' exists in the storage.
Retrieve the list of available file formats supported by the GroupDocs Editor Cloud API.
